page.title: 20Clubs and Organizations.
page.content: Seventy people of Donisthorpe and its environs were asked what clubs and organizations they belonged to.We asked 31 boys,13 girls,14 men and 12 women.Of those asked,26 people were in no organizations whatsoever. The following facts were discovered. The people surveyed belonged to 29 different associations of which 3 were for boys only,2 for girls only,5 for boys and girls,3 for men,2 for women,5 for men and women,2 for men and boys.7 were open to all people. The most popular clubs were ,the youth club for boys and girls,the miners welfare club for men,whilst results for women proved indecisive. 38% of people surveyed go at least once a week to a club.61% of the boys surveyed are in clubs,92% of girls,50% of women and 57% of all people. CONTRIBUTING GROUP:DONISTHORPE SCHOOL
